text:
Controlling the range of variables -

This number will stay between 40 and 50: {{num1}}

This number will always be greater than 50,123: {{num2}}

text:
If you don't want to program your answer, you don't have to:

What color is the sky?

A. red

B. green

C. blue

D. yellow
javascript:
answer.info = 'enter answer as a lowercase letter';
answer = 'c';

text:
You can also have dynamic text instead of dynamic numbers -

Who was the {{number}} president of the United States of America?

What would be the cost for Radiasource to be installed in a 1000 sq. ft attic?

text: A waste water treatment facility handles three waste streams, A, B, and C. The mass flow rate of input waste stream A is {{num1}} times that of input waste stream B, but input waste stream C's mass flow rate is only {{frac1}} that of input waste stream B. The treatment facility first filters out large suspended solids, removing a total of {{amnt1}} {{massunit1}} of solids per minute from A, B, and C under normal operating conditions. This filtering step removes {{perc4}}% of the suspended solids from the waste streams, and a negligible amount of water. After the filtering step, streams A, B, and C are combined into one stream for further purification that will not be addressed here. If the suspended solids from pre-filtered streams A and B are {{perc1}}% and {{perc2}}% by mass respectively, and the total combined solids represent {{perc3}}% of the total input mass from the streams, then what is {{opt}}

tempProblemData.text: A waste water treatment facility handles three waste streams, A, B, and C. The mass flow rate of input waste stream A is {{num1}} times that of input waste stream B, but input waste stream C's mass flow rate is only {{frac1}} that of input waste stream B. The treatment facility first filters out large suspended solids, removing a total of {{amnt1}} {{massunit1}} of solids per minute from A, B, and C under normal operating conditions. This filtering step removes {{perc4}}% of the suspended solids from the waste streams, and a negligible amount of water. After the filtering step, streams A, B, and C are combined into one stream for further purification that will not be addressed here. If the suspended solids from pre-filtered streams A and B are {{perc1}}% and {{perc2}}% by mass respectively, and the total combined solids represent {{perc3}}% of the total input mass from the streams, then what is {{opt}}
